input_text:
Job Title: Digital Project Manager

Location: Buffalo, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Marketing, Project Management

Description:
Are you passionate about influencing cutting-edge digital projects within a dynamic marketing agency? We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented individual to join our team as a Digital Project Manager. In this role, you will be responsible for guiding digital/interactive projects through the agency, ensuring the successful delivery of websites, landing pages, digital ads, emails, and more.
What you'll do:Review project inputs for each digital/interactive job, providing expert insights and best practice advice on functionality and user experience.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project requirements are understood and executed efficiently.Monitor and review each iteration of deliverables, providing valuable feedback for necessary enhancements.Conduct quality assurance testing to ensure all digital deliverables are functioning seamlessly before final deployment.Maintain clear communication with stakeholders, updating them on project progress and addressing any concerns or challenges that arise.Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and advancements in digital marketing and technology.
What you'll bring:2-4+ years digital marketing, web/interactive consulting, SEO, analytics experience, and/or other related experienceCollaboration experience across a range of disciplines, such as media, analytics, UX/UI, and developmentFamiliarity with web development, design principles, and user experience.Experience executing and managing multiple work streams across different teams and clientsProven experience in project management within a marketing agency or digital media environment .Exceptional attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to provide constructive feedback effectively.Proficiency in project management tools and software.
Why join us?Join our innovative and collaborative team and be a driving force in delivering exceptional digital experiences to our clients. If you're ready to take on this exciting opportunity and play a pivotal role in our agency's success, we encourage you to apply and become part of our forward-thinking team.
Gelia is a top 15 B2B marketing communications agency in the US with offices in Buffalo, NY, Raleigh, NC, and Peoria, IL. Gelia works seamlessly across the marketing continuum, driving lasting results for its regional, National, and Global clientele. Since 1961, Gelia has earned a reputation for diving deep into our clientsâ€™ businesses to develop compelling customer-oriented campaigns. We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package to the right candidate. All qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity or expression age, or national origin.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Digital Project Manager
output_json.summary: Join a dynamic marketing agency as a Digital Project Manager.
